评论概述: Perfect for the early 2000s mall goth aesthetic

I ordered this for my teen daughter and I actually passed the cool test with one! We have two very different styles and I usually have to return everything I get her when she isn’t with me. If you/r teen is into the Y2K fad, then you cannot go wrong with this top. Ordered a large and it fits her perfectly. Definitely true to size. It is a little bit short as it comes down right below her belly button! Super cute and worth the buy!
